Physical examination reveals decreased breath sounds on the right side and clubbing of the fingers. A chest X-ray shows a mass in the right lung apex, and a subsequent CT scan confirms a 5 cm tumor with mediastinal lymphadenopathy.

This is the disease which you are to rule out: Asbestosis
